about_the_game:
A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they meet their cheerleading coach for the first time while getting ready in the locker room.

GAME DESCRIPTION

“College Sex” is an erotic visual novel series that follows the story of two attractive young women and their naughty experiences in college.
When Ivy comes up with the idea of giving up alcohol for a while and trying something more athletic, Jade doesn’t know what to say.
Intrigued by the idea of sexy uniforms with short skirts and tight tops, she finally agrees to give it a try.
Once they get to the locker room to prepare for their first cheerleading practice, they realize nobody else is there.
What happens next… we leave it to you to discover.
We promise you a steamy story with high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Sexual blackmail themes.
Contains lesbian and straight sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
